name: Just-Ice
description:
CREATED FOR MINI JAM 46: JUSTICE

MOVE - Arrow keys or Gamepad L Stick
SHOOT - Space key or Gamepad R Trigger
BOOST - Shift key or A Button

GOAL: Survive as long as you can by shooting the garbage off the stage.
RED - Garbage, you don't want this in your coolant.
BLUE - Ice, you want this, will heal / cool down your machine.

If one of your machines fully combusts - game over! The game gets harder over time.

1-4 Players.
